SELECT m.id, m.status, m.remark, m.descr, m.user_id AS userId, m.mt_data_id AS mtDataId, d.system_name AS systemName, m.mt_time AS mtTime FROM maintain_table m LEFT JOIN data_e_table d ON m.mt_data_id = d.id
AND m.id = #{id}
AND m.user_id LIKE '%' || #{userId} || '%'
AND d.system_name LIKE '%' || #{systemName} || '%'
ORDER BY m.mt_time DESC
